text: Florian Schneider-Esleben (7 April 1947 21 April 2020) was a German electronic singer and musician. He was best known as one of the founding members of the electronic band Kraftwerk. He was born in present-day Baden-Württemberg, Germany. David Bowie named a song after Schneider in 1977. Schneider retired in 2008, but then came back in 2014 then officially retiring a year later. Schneider died from cancer on 21 April 2020 in Düsseldorf at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Germany Category:German pop singers Category:German guitarists Category:German violinists Category:German saxophonists Category:German pianists Category:German drummers Category:German pop musicians Category:Electronic musicians Category:People from Baden-Württemberg
title: Florian Schneider
